home.description: Ratone's Room is a recording studio located in Madrid, Spain. We offer recording, mixing and mastering services for bands and artists.

guitar.title: Guitar Recording
guitar.description: We have a wide range of guitars and amps to record your guitar tracks. We also have a wide range of effects pedals to get the sound you are looking for.

mezcla.title: Mixing & Mastering
mezcla.description: We offer mixing & Mastering services for your songs. We can mix your songs in our studio or remotely.

film-music.title: Audiovisuals
film-music.description: We will create the sound identity that will reinforce the message you want to convey, tailor-made and exclusively for your audiovisual project or company.

music-production.title: Music Production
music-production.description: We offer music production services for your songs. We can produce your songs in our studio or remotely.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us for more information about our services.

about.title: About
about.description: Ratone's Room is a recording studio located in Madrid, Spain. You can find us on Calle Najarra, 4F CP 28053, Madrid
